participant_1.background:
I have blue eyes.
My favorite season is spring.
I hate to lose.
My father died when i was 2.

participant_2.background:
I grew up on a farm.
I like going to rock concerts.
On weekends i go out with friends.
I eat eggs and bacon for breakfast.

content.text: I like spring because it's a time for new beginnings.
That's a good answer. What do you like to do in the spring?
I like to go for walks in the park, plant flowers, and clean up around the house.
Sounds like you have a lot of energy in the spring! I'm more of a fall person myself.
I can understand that. Fall is a beautiful time of year.
I like the cooler weather and the changing leaves. What do you like to do in the fall?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping. I also like to go to apple orchards and pumpkin patches.
Those all sound like fun things to do. I've never been to an apple orchard, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
So, what's your favorite childhood memory?

I have a lot of good memories from my childhood, but one of my favorites is when my dad took me fishing. We went to a small pond near our house and I caught my first fish. It was a big bass and I was so excited.
That sounds like a great memory. I love fishing too. I remember when I was a kid, my dad used to take me fishing all the time. We would go to the lake and we would catch a lot of fish.
That's awesome. Fishing is definitely a fun activity to do with family.
It is. I'm glad we're both getting to share our favorite childhood memories.
